snippet.title: Laurie Oakes retires from Nine after 50 years in the press gallery
snippet.content: Press gallery doyen Laurie Oakes has announced his retirement, at 73, from the Nine Network after almost 50 years reporting on federal politics. The legendary correspondent will finish up on August 18, telling Nine he'll find it hard to give it up, but he is looking forward to spending more time reading crime thrillers.
